content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE claim made in the passage. b) Identify ONE way the passage illustrates the political development of Europe in the period 1200–1450.

topic.text: 1.6: Developments in Europe from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
